content:
The present definition of docs#mv_polynomial.is_homogenous assigns the same weight 1 to all indeterminates. In practice, one may need (and @María Inés de Frutos Fernández and I are needing it now) to assign different weights to the monomials.
Has somebody done that already ?

Also, I have not found anything related to homogeneous ideals, for example the fact that the ideal generated by homogeneous polynomials is homogeneous, and the quotient ring is naturally graded, etc.
Not sure how directly this helps, but I should mention that FLT regular has homogeneisation for mv_polynomial.
There's also all the stuff building up to the Proj construction, which is working with homogeneous ideals.
But I don't think anyone has done "non-standard" weights yet.
